name: Either - Would You Rather?!
description:
Either - You Would Rather? is a fun new game in which you have to choose between two difficult scenarios - some are ridiculous, some are quite deep, while others are just fun to answer!

There are hundreds of carefully chosen Would You Rather questions for you to try - with more added on a regular basis!

Game Features :

- Hundreds of Would You Rather questions
- Vote for your favorite of the two scenarios
- View real time statistics on which is more popular
- Frequently updated with more content
- Family friendly questions - suitable for kids. No dirty questions.

Download now for FREE!
